verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> when there was <S%G5607><s%> a very great <S%G3827><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%> to eat, <S%G5315><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to himself, <S%G3004><s%> and said to them, <S%G846><s%>

"I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have <S%G4357><s%> stayed with <S%G4357><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G5101><s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "From where <S%G4159><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> satisfy <S%G5526><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> people with bread <S%G740><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> a deserted place? <S%G2047><s%>"
He <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> do you <S%G2192><s%> have? <S%G1161><s%>" They said, <S%G2036><s%> "Seven. <S%G2033><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G3853><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves. <S%G740><s%> Having given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he broke <S%G2806><s%> them, <S%G2532><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them to <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> serve, <S%G3908><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they served <S%G3908><s%> the <S%G3908><s%> multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> small fish. <S%G2485><s%> Having <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, <S%G2036><s%> he said to <S%G3908><s%> serve <S%G3908><s%> these <S%G846><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

They <S%G1161><s%> ate, <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were filled. <S%G5526><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> of broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces that were left over. <S%G4051><s%>
Those <S%G1161><s%> who had eaten <S%G5315><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> four thousand. <S%G5070><s%> Then <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> away. <S%G630><s%>

He sighed deeply <S%G389><s%> in <S%G4151><s%> his <S%G846><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> does <S%G1934><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seek <S%G1934><s%> a sign? <S%G4592><s%> Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> no <S%G1487><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> will <S%G1325><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G1074><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>"

Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> perceiving <S%G1097><s%> it, <S%G3004><s%> said to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G1260><s%> reason that it <S%G3754><s%>'s because you <S%G3539><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread? <S%G740><s%> Don't <S%G2192><s%> you perceive <S%G4920><s%> yet, <S%G3768><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> understand? <S%G4920><s%> Is <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> hardened? <S%G4456><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I broke <S%G2806><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> thousand, <S%G4000><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of broken pieces did you take up? <S%G142><s%>" They told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to <S%G3056><s%> them openly. <S%G3954><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to himself with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Whoever <S%G3748><s%> wants to come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>
